problem_names:
lemma
  fixes h :: "(nat => nat) => 'foo option"
  shows "(P ** Q ** H) h = (Q ** H ** P) h"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = a ++ b
by (auto simp: plus_fun_def map_add_def split: option.splits)

text \<open>
  Any map can now act as a separation heap without further work:
\<close>

lemma
  fixes h :: "(nat => nat) => 'foo option"
  shows "(P ** Q ** H) h = (Q ** H ** P) h"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P \<and>* Q \<and>* H) h = (Q \<and>* H \<and>* P) h
